user_message: Illegal migrants are receiving $3500 free cellphones and free housing meanwhile victims of hurricane Helene only got $750
ai_response: Hey I did some digging and it turns out that illegal immigrants aren't getting those things especially not $3500.  That claim is reffering to a pilot program in NYC to make food distrubution easier for those in need.  It's only provides food and baby supplies for one month, plus the actual number is closer to $350. user_message: Hillary Clinton supports unlimited abortion on demand up until the moment of birth, including partial-birth abortion, with taxpayer funding.
ai_response: That's a bit misleading.  Clinton clearly supports a womans right to choose an abortion and she's called for ending congressional restrictions on Medicaid funding of abortions. However she's said since 2000 that she'd support a legislated late-term limit on abortion if it included an exception to protect the health of the woman (which the law against partial-birth abortions does not). She hasn't pitched for unlimited abortion on demand.
